channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Keep left bollard, 10th December
item.description:
Keep left bollard missing after some collision. Junction of Battle road /Lower road da176d New Keep left bollard required,atm there is a Cone covering the position of the missing keep left bollard. This is now a safety hazard as the area is not well lit. Immediate attention required.

item.title: 2 large sofas on a main pathway, 9th December
item.description:
Someone has left 2 sofas on the path along the main road. Unsure if it's someone that is a resident of the flats at 46 Combedale or someone else in the surrounding area as people that aren't residents of the flat seem to always use these bins aswell

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Combedale Road, Greenwich
